name: Venture North Aviation, LLC
about: Venture North Aviation, LLC is a premier flight training institution based in Cloquet, Minnesota. Our elite staff, each with thousands of hours of experience, provides comprehensive and advanced accelerated flight training. We offer a range of courses, including 10-day instrument rating, 5-day commercial pilot, and certified flight instructor (CFI and CFII) programs. Additionally, we provide aircraft rental, maintenance, charter services, and fuel supplies. Our facilities include warm hangar space, pilot lounges, and conference rooms. We cater to all levels of flying experience and offer customized training programs to ensure absolute peace of mind for our students. With a personal level of attention and unmatched quality of service, Venture North Aviation is dedicated to leading you toward success in your aviation career.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Instrument Rating (IR)"]
